topic.title: Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Contact
topic.shortdesc: An Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Contact is an assessment or intervention provided by an Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Service offering a range of evidence based interventions in accordance with the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) guidelines for people suffering from depression and anxiety disorders.
